pages.title: Creating Artifacts
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() can be created through numerous of ways.$(br2)You can burn identified $(#033dfc)Artifacts$(), turning them into artifact fragments, allowing you to create a new $(#033dfc)Artifact$() with 4 fragments.

pages.title: Rerolling Artifacts
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() can be rerolled by combining a identified $(#033dfc)Artifact$() with an $(#033dfc)Omega Pog$() inside of an anvil.
